Sorry, somehow I missed the intervening emails.

If non-one has already altered the documentation , then as per mattharden

*Join joins any number of path elements into a single path, adding a Separator between all elements. The result is Cleaned, in particular all empty strings are ignored.*

I'd be tempted make the 'gotcha' explicit - eg from the discussion (Daniel Theophanes)  *"However if you join "D:" to "a", it assumes you want an absolute path."*  to do this could say "no terminal separator is added" 

*Join joins any number of path elements into a single path, adding a file separator between all elements. No terminal separator is added. The result is Cleaned, in particular all empty strings are ignored.*

Sorry no good at documentation
